name: Tousle Flechette Gun
customPrimary: Splits into %s submunitions before impact. Initial projectile only deals %s damage.

name: Stitch Beamlance
customPrimary: Hits on hull or armor periodically arc to weapons and engines, dealing extra EMP and energy damage. Hits on shields have a chance to generate a shield-penetrating arc based on the target's hard flux level.

name: Stitchette Beamlance
customPrimary: Hits on hull or armor periodically arc to weapons and engines, dealing extra EMP and energy damage. Hits on shields have a chance to generate a shield-penetrating arc based on the target's hard flux level.

name: Overcharge Beam
customPrimary: Hits on hull or armor periodically arc to weapons and engines, dealing extra EMP and energy damage. Hits on shields have a chance to generate a shield-penetrating arc based on the target's hard flux level.
customAncillary: Generates weapon charges while ship flux level is above %s.

name: Baste Ion Discharger
customPrimary: Targets missiles when no other targets are available.

name: Seam Storm Pulser
customPrimary: Unstable projectiles have a %s chance to detonate, causing an explosion dealing %s high-explosive damage in a radius around the point of impact.

name: Crinkle Disruptor
customPrimary: Detonates on impact, discharging %s arcs at nearby targets, dealing about %s energy and emp damage each.

name: Tear Hyperpulse Torpedo
customPrimary: Warhead explodes in proximity of target, releasing %s EMP arcs dealing %s EMP and fragmentation damage each in addition to the main blast damage.

customPrimary: Warhead explodes in proximity of target, releasing %s EMP arcs dealing %s EMP and fragmentation damage each in addition to the main blast damage.

customPrimary: Detonates on impact, discharging %s arcs at nearby targets, dealing about %s energy and emp damage each.
